languages.text: "{name}" {n}, — легкая улыбка на лице Кассии заставляет на мгновение забыть о предстоящей битве, —{/n} "Мы вместе прошли долгий путь, давайте же вместе его и закончим".
"{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."
languages.original_text: "{name}" {n}, — легкая улыбка на лице Кассии заставляет на мгновение забыть о предстоящей битве, —{/n} "Мы вместе прошли долгий путь, давайте же вместе его и закончим".

traits.locale_text: "{name}" {n}, the faint smile on Cassia's face makes you forget about the upcoming battle for a moment, {/n} "We have come a long way together. Let us finish it together as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “{name}。”{n}卡西娅脸上淡淡的笑容，让你暂时忘记了即将到来的战斗。{/n}“我们一起走过了漫长的道路，让我们一同完成这场旅程吧。”
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."

traits.locale_text: “{name}。”{n}卡西娅脸上淡淡的笑容，让你暂时忘记了即将到来的战斗。{/n}“我们一起走过了漫长的道路，让我们一同完成这场旅程吧。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «{name}». {n}La leve sonrisa en el rostro de Cassia hace que te olvides por un momento de la inminente batalla.{/n} «Hemos recorrido un largo camino junt{mf|o|a}s. Pongámosle fin junt{mf|o|a}s también».
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."

traits.locale_text: «{name}». {n}La leve sonrisa en el rostro de Cassia hace que te olvides por un momento de la inminente batalla.{/n} «Hemos recorrido un largo camino junt{mf|o|a}s. Pongámosle fin junt{mf|o|a}s también».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}」{n}カシアのかすかな笑みが、差し迫った戦いのことを一瞬忘れさせてくれる。{/n}「これまでに長い間、一緒に旅してきました。その最後まで、共に参りましょう」
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}」{n}カシアのかすかな笑みが、差し迫った戦いのことを一瞬忘れさせてくれる。{/n}「これまでに長い間、一緒に旅してきました。その最後まで、共に参りましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Das schwache Lächeln auf Cassias Gesicht lässt dich die bevorstehende Schlacht vorübergehend vergessen.{/n} "Wir haben einen langen Weg gemeinsam bereist. Lasst uns die Reise auch gemeinsam zu Ende bringen."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."

traits.locale_text: "{name}." {n}Das schwache Lächeln auf Cassias Gesicht lässt dich die bevorstehende Schlacht vorübergehend vergessen.{/n} "Wir haben einen langen Weg gemeinsam bereist. Lasst uns die Reise auch gemeinsam zu Ende bringen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {name}. » {n}Le sourire ténu qui illumine les traits de Cassia vous fait oublier un instant le combat qui vous attend.{/n} « Nous avons parcouru un long chemin, vous et moi. L'heure est venue d'en finir, ensemble. »
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."

traits.locale_text: « {name}. » {n}Le sourire ténu qui illumine les traits de Cassia vous fait oublier un instant le combat qui vous attend.{/n} « Nous avons parcouru un long chemin, vous et moi. L'heure est venue d'en finir, ensemble. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{name}." {n}Cassia'nın yüzündeki hafif gülümseme, yaklaşmakta olan savaşı bir anlığına unutmanı sağlıyor.{/n} "Birlikte çok uzun yollar aştık. Bu işi de birlikte bitirelim."
languages.original_text: "{name}." {n}The faint smile on Cassia's face makes you momentarily forget about the impending battle.{/n} "We have travelled a long road together. Let us finish it together as well."
